synopsis.text:
All his life, Mash Burnedead sought tranquility in the heart of a forest, far from a society that reveres magic above all else. Born without magical abilities in a world where they are the norm, Mash's extraordinary strength became his sanctuary. But when the authorities discover his secret, they offer him a choice: enroll in the esteemed Easton Magic Academy and become a 'Divine Visionary' or face persecution.

Thrust into an unfamiliar world of enchantments and sorcery, Mash must rely on his brawn to outshine the elite students who wield magic with ease. With his family's safety hanging in the balance, he embarks on a journey to prove that sheer muscle power can triumph over the most potent spells. Can Mash defy the odds and become the unlikeliest 'Divine Visionary' the academy has ever seen, or will his lack of magic be his downfall? Witness the thrilling saga of an underdog who challenges the very foundations of a magical society.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
